name: Houndoom
flavorText:
If you are burned
by the flames it
shoots from its mouth, the pain
will never go
away.

pokemon.name: Houndour
pokemon.flavorText:
It uses different
kinds of cries for
communicating with others of its kind
and for pursuing
its prey.
